name: part_000
file: tmp_【3Dお披露目】刮目せよ！吾輩の力を開放する時ッツ！！#ラプラス・ダークネス3D 【ラプラス・ダークネス⧸ホロライブ】 [V0Zk55CpFEM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title sequence and visual countdown for the 3D debut showcase.
La+ Darknesss appears on stage and greets the audience before her first song.
Outro speech after the song performance, transitioning to a special video.

subtitles.original: アンデッドアリス！
subtitles.english: Undead Alice!

subtitles.original: みんな集まってくれてありがとうございまーす！
subtitles.english: Thank you all for coming!

subtitles.original: 最後まで楽しんでってくれると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: I hope you'll enjoy until the very end!

subtitles.original: まずは一曲目行きます！
subtitles.english: Here is the first song!

subtitles.original: 思うようにいかないなら
subtitles.english: If things don't go the way you want

subtitles.original: 私を捨て君は生きて
subtitles.english: then cast me aside and live on

subtitles.original: 狂ってた君の残響は
subtitles.english: Even though I can hear the echoes

subtitles.original: 僕じゃなくたって聴こえるのに
subtitles.english: of your madness even without you

subtitles.original: 自傷は綻ぶたびに
subtitles.english: Every time self-harm unravels

subtitles.original: 幸せ吸って毒を吐いて
subtitles.english: inhale happiness and exhale poison

subtitles.original: 理想じゃ二人のだけが
subtitles.english: It feels good knowing that in our ideals,

subtitles.original: 正常だって気持ちいいじゃんか
subtitles.english: only the two of us are normal, right?

subtitles.original: 合図で誤魔化したい様が
subtitles.english: The way you want to deceive with signals

subtitles.original: 会いたくちゃ不自然だろが
subtitles.english: is unnatural when you want to meet

subtitles.original: 仲良くなっちゃってよ
subtitles.english: Let's get along

subtitles.original: 底冷えドキドキが嫌になって
subtitles.english: I'm tired of the bone-chilling palpitations

subtitles.original: 僕が君を殺す前に
subtitles.english: Before I kill you,

subtitles.original: 死んでくれ
subtitles.english: please die

subtitles.original: 吊るしていてよ　吊るしていてよ
subtitles.english: Keep me hanging, keep me hanging

subtitles.original: 壊していてよ　壊していてよ
subtitles.english: Keep breaking me, keep breaking me

subtitles.original: 卑怯な愛はここに埋めよう
subtitles.english: Let's bury this cowardly love here

subtitles.original: 忘れるんだ　こんなのもうやめよう
subtitles.english: Let's forget, let's stop this already

subtitles.original: 嫌った方が　嫌ってい出ても
subtitles.english: Even if the one who hated continues to hate

subtitles.original: 想った方が　想っていたんじゃんか
subtitles.english: The one who loved, loved you after all

subtitles.original: もう笑えない僕の
subtitles.english: For the me who can no longer smile,

subtitles.original: アンデッドアリスへ
subtitles.english: to Undead Alice

subtitles.original: 予想通り僕の夢が
subtitles.english: As expected, as my dreams

subtitles.original: 輝くほど君は陰ってく
subtitles.english: shine brighter, you grow darker

subtitles.original: 犠牲を我慢と呼んで
subtitles.english: Calling sacrifice "patience,"

subtitles.original: 汚れた手で何を回した
subtitles.english: what did you spin with those dirty hands?

subtitles.original: 悪用しないように
subtitles.english: So as not to make things worse,

subtitles.original: それがつまり悪い形
subtitles.english: which essentially is a bad shape

subtitles.original: 保存状態愛は冷凍で
subtitles.english: Preservation state: Love is frozen

subtitles.original: 何度も温め直すんですか？
subtitles.english: Are you going to reheat it over and over?

subtitles.original: 正しくありたい本能が
subtitles.english: The instinct to want to be right

subtitles.original: 正しくないことの脂肪が
subtitles.english: and the fat of being wrong

subtitles.original: 仲良くなっちゃってよ
subtitles.english: let's get along

subtitles.original: 底冷えハナハナが苦になって
subtitles.english: I'm tired of the bone-chilling separation

subtitles.original: 僕が僕を殺す前に
subtitles.english: Before I kill myself,

subtitles.original: 死んでやる
subtitles.english: I'll die

subtitles.original: 吊るしていてよ　吊るしていてよ
subtitles.english: Keep me hanging, keep me hanging

subtitles.original: 壊していてよ　壊していてよ
subtitles.english: Keep breaking me, keep breaking me

subtitles.original: 卑怯な愛はここに埋めよう
subtitles.english: Let's bury this cowardly love here

subtitles.original: 忘れるんだ　こんなのもうやめよう
subtitles.english: Let's forget, let's stop this already

subtitles.original: 嫌った方が　嫌ってい出ても
subtitles.english: Even if the one who hated continues to hate

subtitles.original: 想った方が　想っていたんじゃんか
subtitles.english: The one who loved, loved you after all

subtitles.original: もう笑えない僕の
subtitles.english: For the me who can no longer smile,

subtitles.original: アンデッドアリスへ
subtitles.english: to Undead Alice

subtitles.original: ずっとこのまま　ふたりで夢を見れるって
subtitles.english: That we could keep dreaming together forever...

subtitles.original: 勝手ばかりで　君はどんな顔で笑っていたっけ
subtitles.english: You were so selfish, what kind of face did you have when you smiled?

subtitles.original: バイバイしたから　元通りなんて幻想だ
subtitles.english: Since we said goodbye, things going back to normal is just an illusion

subtitles.original: まあまあツラいじゃん　胸を割いて愛を潰してくれよ
subtitles.english: It's pretty painful, so rip open my chest and crush this love

subtitles.original: 吊るしていてよ　吊るしていてよ
subtitles.english: Keep me hanging, keep me hanging

subtitles.original: 壊していてよ　壊していてよ
subtitles.english: Keep breaking me, keep breaking me

subtitles.original: 卑怯な愛はここに埋めよう
subtitles.english: Let's bury this cowardly love here

subtitles.original: 忘れるんだ　こんなのもうやめよう
subtitles.english: Let's forget, let's stop this already

subtitles.original: 嫌った方が　嫌ってい出ても
subtitles.english: Even if the one who hated continues to hate

subtitles.original: 想った方が　想っていたんじゃんか
subtitles.english: The one who loved, loved you after all

subtitles.original: もう笑えない僕の
subtitles.english: For the me who can no longer smile,

subtitles.original: アンデッドアリスへ
subtitles.english: to Undead Alice

subtitles.original: 痛いくらいで　消えそうもないや
subtitles.english: It hurts so much, but it won't disappear

subtitles.original: 地獄くらいじゃ　消えそうもないや
subtitles.english: Even hell won't make it disappear

subtitles.original: 「ごめんね」なんて　言えるはずないな
subtitles.english: I could never say "I'm sorry"

subtitles.original: 密かな期待なんて　叶えられないなんて
subtitles.english: That secret expectations could never be fulfilled...

subtitles.original: 違うじゃないか　違うじゃないか
subtitles.english: That's not it, that's not it

subtitles.original: 死ねない想いは　火にまかせるのか
subtitles.english: Will I leave these feelings that won't die to the flames?

subtitles.original: もう笑えない僕の
subtitles.english: For the me who can no longer smile,

subtitles.original: アンデッドアリスへ
subtitles.english: to Undead Alice

subtitles.original: まだまだお披露目続くから
subtitles.english: The showcase is still going on,

subtitles.original: 最後まで見ていってね！
subtitles.english: so stay tuned until the very end!

subtitles.original: それではここからは
subtitles.english: Now, from here

subtitles.original: スペシャルな動画があるから
subtitles.english: we have a special video, so...
